Biography
View Hide Full Bio

"I am very excited to join the San Marcos Orthopedics. It is an honor to join such an incredible group of physicians and surgeons who provide top-notch care and utilize the latest technology to help patients and athletes get back to doing what they love." - Dr. Aseem Saini, DPM

ABOUT ME

Aseem Saini, DPM is the newest member of San Marcos Orthopedics.

Dr. Aseem Saini joined San Marcos Orthopedics after completing a comprehensive surgical residency at the renowned John Peter Smith Hospital (JPS), a level I trauma hospital in the heart of Fort Worth where he served as Chief Resident. During his three years at JPS, Dr. Saini was exposed to complex foot and ankle injuries and specializes in both surgical and non-surgical treatment of various pathologies. Dr. Saini’s expertise in the field of Foot and Ankle Surgery includes: rearfoot, midfoot, ankle fractures, foot and ankle reconstructive surgeries, ankle stabilization, sports injuries, tendon repair and transfers, ankle arthroscopy, minimally invasive bunion correction, hammertoes, external fixation, hindfoot and rearfoot fusions, diabetic limb salvage, diabetic wound care, and more.

Dr. Saini is devoted to delivering personalized care to all his patients. He enjoys collaborating with his patients as a team to find a treatment that best suits their specific needs and lifestyle. Dr. Saini believes that all conservative treatment measures should be exhausted prior to proceeding to surgery. If conservative treatment measures fail, he utilizes the most up to date, research backed treatment algorithms to address his patients foot and ankle ailments and relieve their pain.

Dr. Saini is devoted to delivering personalized care to all his patients. He enjoys collaborating with his patients as a team to find a treatment that best suits their specific needs and lifestyle. Dr. Saini believes that all conservative treatment measures should be exhausted prior to proceeding to surgery. If conservative treatment measures fail, he utilizes the most up to date, research backed treatment algorithms to address his patients foot and ankle ailments and relieve their pain.

Dr. Saini completed his undergraduate studies at the University of California, Santa Cruz where he received his Bachelor in Science in Biology. He received his DPM degree from Western University of Health Sciences where he graduated among the top of his class.

To schedule an appointment with Dr. Saini, call (512)878-4203 or CLICK HERE to submit an online appointment request.
